actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a specified portion of the Dosewallips River, Washington, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Designates specified portions of the following rivers in the State of Washington for study as potential additions to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System: (1) Hoh River; (2) Dosewallips River; (3) Quillayute River; and (4) Humptulips River. Requires the studies of such rivers to be completed not later than October 1, 1983. Requires such studies of the Hoh, Dosewallips, and Quillayute Rivers to include an analysis of the various means which may be practicable and appropriate to maintain and enhance the fisheries resources of such rivers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act.
